remarks: A left coset can be expressed as the image of a left action. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Sep-2015.)
statement:
eqger.x $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
eqger.r $e |- .~ = ( G ~QG Y ) $.
eqglact.3 $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
eqglact $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ Y C_ X /\ A e. X ) -> [ A ] .~ = ( ( x e. X |-> ( A .+ x ) ) " Y ) ) $.
$d .+ x $.
$d .~ x $.
$d A x $.
$d G x $.
$d X x $.
$d Y x $.
